result.geographic_coverage: 111110: Overseas, United Kingdom (England, Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland)
result.name: exceptions-to-government-moratoria-bis
result.notes: Lists items of spend that have been allowed in BIS since the announcement (24 May 2010) of five cross-government moratoria: ICT spend above £1m; Advertising and marketing; consultancy; Property leases & lease extensions; and Civil Service recruitment. Exceptions to spend requests may not be required for each sector every quarter by the Department.

odi-certificate.title: Exceptions to cross-government moratoria on spend in BIS

organization.name: department-for-business-innovation-and-skills
organization.title: Department for Business, Innovation and Skills
organization.description: The Department for Business, Innovation & Skills (BIS) closed in July 2016. The department had held responsibility for further and higher education skills; supporting business, productivity, innovation, science and research; consumer rights and business regulation.

result.title: Exceptions to cross-government moratoria on spend in BIS
